meanings.definition: The act of creating an aquatint.
meanings.sent2: I learned about aquatinting in my art class.
meanings.sent3: The artist's aquatinting of the landscape brought it to life.
meanings.sent4: Her aquatinting of emotions on paper was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The aquatinting of the ocean scene made me feel like I was there.

meanings.sent1: She enjoys aquatinting as a hobby.
meanings.sent2: I will be aquatinting a new piece for the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: He was aquatinting away happily in his studio.
meanings.sent4: The artist was aquatinting his dreams onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: Aquatinting the portrait brought out its details beautifully.

meanings.definition: The process of etching a design on a metal plate using acid.
meanings.sent1: The aquatinting of the metal plate was meticulous.
meanings.sent2: The art student studied aquatinting techniques in class.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy aquatinting resulted in an interesting pattern.
meanings.sent4: Aquatinting the intricate design required patience and skill.
meanings.sent5: The aquatinting process revealed a stunning image on the plate.
